channel.title: How i get dragon arrows to work? Also my bows dont need arrows help please PICS
channel.description: No arrows:- [IMG]http://i15.tinypic.com/5xrtgfq.jpg[/img] Please help :) And also when i try to pickup 1000 dragon arrows it gives me 1.. Why?

item.title: How i get dragon arrows to work? Also my bows dont need arrows help please PICS
item.dc:creator: @Khasck Khasck
item.description:
@Khasck wrote:

first off, make the dark bow use the arrows, by searching for whatever arrows it uses now, if any, if not, code it under it.
and your arrow problem, that most people have, is that you ddn’t do any coding for it.
try picking up 10000 unnoted mith bars, what happends?
you get one.
so code that its a stackable item, and you should be good to go

-Liam

Read full topic
item.source: How i get dragon arrows to work? Also my bows dont need arrows help please PICS

item.title: How i get dragon arrows to work? Also my bows dont need arrows help please PICS
item.dc:creator: @nd_w0t nd w0t
item.description:
@nd_w0t wrote:

If you want the projectile to show, with your DarkBow, you need to add something like this…

createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 80, 249, 43, 31, 0 - AttackingOn);

I dont use that ^^, you’ll see why when you add it, but thats like a template which you can edit etc…

Alright next, go to your attack method…

public boolean Attack()
Or
public void Attack()

And add this [size=10pt]NEAR[/size] the top…

		int offsetX = (absX - X) * -1;
		int offsetY = (absY - Y) * -1;

If the problem is that the arrows aren’t showing in the correct slot, just make sure that you have that added… Check Item.CFG, and also in client.java, im not really sure what it would look like… So i can’t help you there :S… But hope the projectile thing helped you.

[Offtopic]
Lmao you dont need Dell for that…
[/Offtopic]

Read full topic
